items.name: DIURNAL MANTLE
description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Diurnal Mantle
description: Each time a shooting attack is made against this operative, if the ranged weapon has the Torrent or Blast special rule, this operative is treated as having a Save characteristic of 3+ for that shooting attack.

items.name: PLASMA GRANADE
description: The operative is equipped with the following ranged weapon for the battle:

items.name: CORSAIR BLADE
description: The operative is equipped with the following melee weapon for the battle:

items.name: OCULAR SCANNER
description: The operative can perform the following action during the battle:

action.name: OCULAR SCANNER
description: Until the end of this operative's activation, the ranged weapons it is equipped with gain the No Cover special rule.

items.name: RUNES OF PROTECTION
description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Runes of Protection
description: Each time a shooting attack is made against this operative, in the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, if that shooting attack was made as a result of the Manifest Psychic Power action, you can re-roll any or all of your defence dice.

items.name: MISTFIELD
description: VOIDSCARRED FELARCH operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Mistfield
description: While a friendly CORSAIR VOIDSCARRED operative is within ((2)) of this operative, that operative has a 5+ invulnerable save.

items.name: LODESTAR HELM
description: VOIDSCARRED WAY SEEKER operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Lodestar Helm
description: The second time this operative performs the Manifest Psychic Power action in each of its activations, it does not suffer any mortal wounds as a result of rolling a 1-2 (note this does not allow you to select a psychic power to be resolved).

items.name: PATHFINDER CLOAK
description: VOIDSCARRED FATE DEALER operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Pathfinder Cloak
description: While this operative has a Conceal order, it is always treated as having a Conceal order, regardless of any other rules (e.g. Vantage Point).

rareItems.name: LONG-SIGHT HELM
description: Ranged weapons the operative is equipped with gain the Ceaseless special rule for the battle.

rareItems.name: FLIP BELT
description: The operative gains the FLY keyword for the battle.

rareItems.name: SPIRIT STONE
description: VOIDSCARRED SOUL WEAVER operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Spirit Stone
description: This operative can perform the Soul Channel action twice during its activation.

rareItems.name: PSYCHOREACTIVE ARMOUR
description: Change the operative's Save characteristic to 3+ for the battle.

rareItems.name: RELIC POWER WEAPON
description: Operative equipped with a power weapon only. The power weapon this operative is equipped with gains the Balanced special rule for the battle.

rareItems.name: RELIC WITCH STAFF
description: VOIDSCARRED WAY SEEKER operative only. The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Relic Witch Staff
description: The second time this operative performs the Manifest Psychic Power action in each of its activations, you can re-roll the D6 when determining the result of that action.

items.name: SHRIEKER TOXIN ROUNDS
description: Select one shuriken pistol or shrieker cannon the operative is equipped with. That weapon gains the MW1 critical hit rule for the battle. If you selected a shrieker cannon, this equipment costs 4EP; otherwise, it costs 3EP.

items.name: DEATH MASK
description: This operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Death Mask
description: If this operative is incapacitated, at the end of that activation, you gain 1CP.

items.name: ACCELERATED MONOFILAMENT WIRE
description: Select one embrace the operative is equipped with. That weapon gains the Reap 1 critical hit rule and Lethal 5+ special rule for the battle.

items.name: SUPERTENSILE MONOFILAMENT WIRE
description: Select one kiss the operative is equipped with. Add 1 to that weapon's Normal Damage characteristic for the battle.

items.name: WRAITHBONE TALISMAN
description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Wraithbone Talisman
description: Once per battle, when this operative is fighting in combat, making a shooting attack or a shooting attack is being made against it, you can use the Command Re-roll Tactical Ploy without spending any Command Points.

items.name: PRISMATIC GRENADE
description: The operative is equipped with the following ranged weapon for the battle:

items.name: PURE PSYCHOCRYSTALS
description: Select one neuro disruptor the operative is equipped with. That weapon gains the Lethal 5+ special rule for the battle.

items.name: SUPPORT GRIP
description: DEATH JESTER operative only. Remove the Heavy special rule from the shrieker cannon that operative is equipped with for the battle. That weapon gains the following special rule for the battle instead:

ability.name: Cumbersome
description: An operative cannot move more than 3 in the same activation in which it performs a Shoot action with this ranged weapon.

rareItems.name: HIDDEN GUISE
description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Hidden Guise
description: Once per battle, at the start of the Strategy phase, you can select this operative to have the pivotal role instead.

rareItems.name: CRYSTAL SHARD
description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Crystal Shard
description: Once per battle, when a shooting attack is made against this operative, at the start of the Roll Defence Dice step of that shooting attack, you can use this ability. If you do so, until the end of the Turning Point, this operative has a 3+ invulnerable save.

rareItems.name: SHIMMERCLONE
description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Shimmerclone
description: Once per battle, in the Resolve Successful Hits step of a combat or shooting attack, when damage would be inflicted on this operative from an attack dice, you can use this ability. If you do so, ignore the damage inflicted from that attack dice.

rareItems.name: FALCON'S FEATHER
description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Falcon's Feather
description: At the start of each Firefight phase after the first, if this operative is not within Line of Sight of every enemy operative, it can perform a free Dash action.

rareItems.name: MOCKING PANOPLY
description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Mocking Panoply
description: Each time this operative moves, you can roll one D6 for each enemy operative it moved within ((2)) of during that move. On a 5+, that enemy operative suffers D3 mortal wounds.

rareItems.name: RAIMENT OF MIRRORS
description: The operative gains the following ability for the battle:

ability.name: Raiment of Mirrors
description: Each time this operative fights in combat, or a shooting attack is made against it by an enemy operative within ((6)) of it, in the Roll Attack Dice step of that combat or shooting attack, your opponent's attack dice results of 1-3 are failed hits.
